text: William Cecil "Cece" Foderingham (August 12, 1919 – January 29, 1983) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto RCAF Hurricanes and the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with both teams, first in 1942 and again in 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=fodercec001http://www.profootballarchives.com/1947irfutor.htmlObituaries, Toronto Star, January 31, 1983, pg.
